page.title: 15STANHOPE JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: { A TYPICAL DAY _ School begins at 9.00, many children meeting on the playground beforehand. The day begins with registration, followed by an Assembly. Children often accompany hymns with recorder or percussion work. During the day there is often an opportunity for watching educational films on projector, slides, filmstrips or a T.V. Programme for Schools. Lunch is taken in the School Hall, some children bringing a packed lunch, some taking advantage of the County scheme. The afternoon may see groups having games on the field or playground. After school there may well be some club activity in due season _ football, netball, tennis, badminton, table tennis _ other clubs operate at lunch_time.
